channel.title: Newcombe on Jiangtang Hu | 胡江堂
channel.description: Recent content in Newcombe on Jiangtang Hu | 胡江堂

item.title: A SAS Implementation of Confidence Intervals for Single Proportion: Eleven Methods
item.description: The following two papers by Professor Robert Newcombe, in my limit observation, are the most frequently cited papers in the industry for CI calculation: Two-sided confidence intervals for the single proportion: comparison of seven methods. Newcombe RG, Stat Med , Volume 17 , 8 (April 1998) pp.857-872 Interval estimation for the difference between independent proportions: comparison of eleven methods. Newcombe RG, Stat Med , Volume 17 , 8 (April 1998) pp.

item.title: Recursive Referencing and Binomial Proportion Interval
item.description: To understand recursion, one of the most important concepts in programming languages, you could watch the movie, Chris Nolan’s Inception: it is about a dream within a dream within a dream, …and, read two statistical papers by Professor Robert Newcombe, one of the most prolific statisticians: Two-sided confidence intervals for the single proportion: comparison of seven methods. Newcombe RG, Stat Med , Volume 17 , 8 (April 1998) pp.
